snippet: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton said that a decision on whether to remove Mujahedeen Khalq from the list of terrorist organizations would depend in part on the group’s cooperation in moving to a new location inside Iraq.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton said that a decision on whether to remove Mujahedeen Khalq from the list of terrorist organizations would depend in part on the group’s cooperation in moving to a new location inside Iraq.

headline.seo: Clinton Urges Mujahedeen Khalq to Complete Move
headline.main: Clinton Urges Iranian Group to Complete Move
headline.print_headline: Clinton Urges Iranian Group to Complete Move
